title: Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin party with Jared Leto, Brooklyn Beckham
text:
Justin and Hailey let their hair down on Saturday night (Picture: Backgrid)

Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin put their party shoes on and headed for a night out this weekend to celebrate a friend’s birthday in Beverly Hills.

It’s no surprise the couple cut casual figures as they didn’t have to venture too far out, walking just a few blocks to their neighbour’s house where the star-studded party was taking place on Saturday night.

The couple, who married for a second time just a few weeks ago, celebrated the birthday of music mogul Andrew Watts who lives in their neighbourhood.

After enjoying all the celebrations, the pair were seen strolling back to their own mansion hand-in-hand. At one point, Justin had Hailey on one side and another female friend on the other with his arms wrapped around his dates for the night.

It’s probably wise they didn’t hop in an Uber as Hailey was spotted wearing a pair of thigh-high PVC heeled boots which may have been a tad uncomfortable to walk in.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The 22-year-old model teamed the saucy footwear with a pair of daisy duke shorts and a white cami, while Justin kept his look super casual in a red t-shirt and matching trousers.

Inside the party, the couple were in good company as they had the opportunity to mingle with the likes of Jared Leto, Camila Cabello, Kaia Gerber, Brooklyn Beckham and DJ Diplo who all had invites to the a-list bash.

Justin and Hailey didn’t have far to walk back to their mansion (Picture: Backgrid)

These boots were made for walking? (Picture: Backgrid)

Maroon 5 frontman Adam Levine was spotted leaving the party with his wife Behati Prinsloo, after entertaining guests by performing some of his own hits.

It’s possible Hailey and Justin won’t be neighbours with birthday boy Andrew for much longer, as the popstar recently revealed his plans to sell the property.

After giving fans a tour of their plush pad, Justin revealed: ‘Home vibes, but I wanna sell it I think anyone interested?

‘I think I wanna sell my home in Beverly Hills who wants it… I’ll sell it with all the furniture . MAKE AN OFFER [sic].’

It’s not known where the newlyweds will set up their new humble abode but an invite to the housewarming would be nice.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The couple tied the knot for the second time in September, after quietly getting married at a New York courthouse in 2018.

But a source has claimed the pair have no plans to jet off on a honeymoon right now, telling People: ‘For Justin and Hailey, every day is like a honeymoon. They are both fine with [not having anything planned],’ adding that Justin is ‘very focused’ on his new music.

description: Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin were spotted holding hands after partying at a music mogul's birthday in Beverly Hills.
